text: Tisbury is a suburb of New Zealand's southernmost city, Invercargill. The population was 288 in the 2013 census. This was an increase of 39 people since the 2006 Census. The unsteady climate often affect crops in Tisbury. In 2015 the cold weather continued till Christmas and vegetable farmers were unable to yield crops in time.crop growing in Tisbury ==References== Category:Suburbs of Invercargill
title: Tisbury, New Zealand
